tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE MeetingSchedule (
  meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  meeting_date DATE,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME,
  organizer_name VARCHAR(50),
  agenda TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_schedule (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_topic VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    meeting_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE agenda (
    agenda_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    agenda_item VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    presenter VARCHAR(100),
    duration_minutes INT
);

CREATE TABLE meeting_schedule (
    meeting_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    organizer VARCHAR(100),
    attendees JSON
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_agenda (
    agenda_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id UUID REFERENCES meeting_schedule(meeting_id),
    item_number INTEGER,
    topic VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    presenter VARCHAR(100),
    time_allocated INTERVAL
)

CREATE TABLE meeting_notes (
    note_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id UUID REFERENCES meeting_schedule(meeting_id),
    agenda_id UUID REFERENCES meeting_agenda(agenda_id),
    note_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    note_content TEXT,
    note_taker VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_title VARCHAR(255),
    meeting_date DATE,
    meeting_time TIME,
    organizer_name VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE schedule (
    schedule_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_id INT,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME,
    participant_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE meetings (
    meeting_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    meeting_name TEXT,
    meeting_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);

CREATE TABLE agendas (
    agenda_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    agenda_topic TEXT,
    agenda_description TEXT,
    meeting_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (meeting_id) REFERENCES meetings(meeting_id)
);

CREATE TABLE discussions (
    discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    discussion_topic TEXT,
    discussion_details TEXT,
    agenda_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (agenda_id) REFERENCES agendas(agenda_id)
);
